title: FS: Bob Rhoades Tolstoi PSA 4 Highest graded example! SOLD!

posts.post_title: FS: Bob Rhoades Tolstoi PSA 4 Highest graded example! SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Offering this rare Bob Rhoades Tolstoi PSA 4. This wonderful card has a total population of 7 (4 PSA and 3 SGC), only one other 4 and none ever graded higher. The card is centered nicely and has nice color and eye appeal. Asking SOLD delivered for this great card. Paypal F/F or money orders accepted. Email [url]rknight1@columbus.rr.com[/url] with any questions or offers. Thanks!
